title: Stuffed chicken thighs
description: Chicken thighs are super cheap and full of flavour. Fill with a herby stuffing for a tasty budget meal.
ingredients: 2 garlic cloves, crushed to a paste with the edge of a knife
1 lemon, zest only, plus the juice of half a lemon
salt and freshly ground black pepper
6 chicken thighs, bones removed, skin left on
